snippet.title: LABOR'S SOCIETY OF BLUDGERS
snippet.content:
What is Labor's vision? To have the many bludge off the few?
Labor's assault on higher income taxpayers would raise $10.8 billion over the next four years and $76bn over the next decade, but the policies have sparked an -attack from business leaders over Bill Shorten's focus on income -redistribution at the expense of growth. The 3 per cent of taxpayers paying the top marginal tax rate already provide 30 per cent of tax revenue, a share Labor's policies and bracket creep would push -towards 35 per cent.
